page.shortlink: ux control properties frame begin properties frame pane style
page.description: Specify the style for the frame pane. This property is only available if the *[ui:Frame type]* is 'Modern'.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Frame pane style]* property can be used to define in-line styles for the frame pane for a modern frame. The frame pane is the area that contains the contents of the frame.
